deleteConfirm.title: Delete webhook?
deleteConfirm.description: This action cannot be undone. Future events will no longer be delivered to this webhook ({{notificationUrl}}).

create.title: Create Database
create.description: Initialize a new database instance for storing tables and data.

delete.title: Delete Database
delete.description: Permanently removes an existing database and all the data and tables it contains.

update.title: Update Database
update.description: Update database configurations or properties, such as changing names or security settings.

create.title: Create Table
create.description: A new table is added to the database to store structured data records.

delete.title: Delete Table
delete.description: Permanently removes a table and all its data from the database.

update.title: Update Table
update.description: Modify the structure or attributes of a table, such as adding, deleting, or modifying columns.

create.title: Create Field
create.description: Add new fields to the table to store data items.

delete.title: Delete Field
delete.description: Removes the specified field from the table and deletes the associated data.

update.title: Update Field
update.description: Change the definition of an existing field, such as field name, type, etc.

create.title: Create Record
create.description: Adds a new data record to the table, populating each field value.

delete.title: Delete Record
delete.description: Removes the specified data record from the table.

update.title: Update Record
update.description: Updates one or more field values of an existing record in a table.

create.title: Create View
create.description: Define a new view that provides a specific representation of the data for data query or presentation.

delete.title: Delete View
delete.description: Remove an existing view definition without affecting the underlying data table.

update.title: Update View
update.description: Update the definition of the view, including the data or presentation formats involved.
